title: Intersections of complex structures
abstract:
We study the sets of planes in an even dimensional real vector space $V$
which are simultaneously stabilised by a pair of complex structures on $V$. We
completely describe these sets of planes for pairs of orthogonal complex
structures. Generically, the number of such planes is finite. We compute this
number for orthogonal complex structures and prove that it gives a lower bound
for the number of planes simultaneously stabilised by a generic pair of complex
structures on $V$.
